SELECT
FROM (SELECT
FROM sys_dictionary d WHERE parent_id IS NOT NULL AND is_delete = 0) t1, (SELECT @pid := #{dictParentId}) t2 WHERE FIND_IN_SET(parent_id, @pid) > 0 AND @pid := concat( @pid, ',', id )
UNION SELECT
FROM sys_dictionary d WHERE id = #{dictParentId} AND is_delete = 0

SELECT t1.* FROM (SELECT d.* FROM sys_dictionary d WHERE parent_id IS NOT NULL AND is_delete = 0) t1, (SELECT @pid := #{dictParentId}) t2 WHERE FIND_IN_SET(parent_id, @pid) > 0 AND @pid := concat( @pid, ',', id )
UNION SELECT d.* FROM sys_dictionary d WHERE id = #{dictParentId} AND is_delete = 0

SELECT
FROM sys_dictionary d WHERE d.is_delete = 0 and d.dict_type = #{dictType} ORDER BY d.create_time

SELECT
, s.system_name FROM sys_dictionary d WHERE d.is_delete = 0 and `level` = 1 ORDER BY d.create_time

SELECT t1.* FROM sys_dictionary t1 JOIN ( SELECT @id AS _id, (SELECT @id := parent_id FROM sys_dictionary WHERE id = _id) AS parentId FROM (SELECT @id := #{dictId}) vars, sys_dictionary WHERE @id IS NOT NULL ) t2 ON t1.id = t2._id ORDER BY t1.create_time

SELECT
FROM sys_dictionary d WHERE d.dict_code IN
#{code}
ORDER BY d.create_time
